title: WATCH & VOTE: Harry Kane's best Premier League goal
description: After Harry Kane notched his 100th Premier League in Tottenham's thrilling 2-2 draw with Liverpool, we are asking you to vote for your favourite.
content:
The England international reached the landmark in the second-fewest games with a stoppage-time penalty at Anfield, just minutes after he had a spot-kick saved.
Only Alan Shearer (124) has hit a century of goals in the modern era quicker than Kane (141), whose late-blossoming career has been littered with spectacular goals.
But what was your favourite? His curling effort against Arsenal? His shot on the swivel against Liverpool? Or his thunderbolt against Chelsea?
We have picked out our top 10, which you can watch in the video at the top of the page, and you can vote for your favourite below…
